note:
she/her/hers
Settler on unceded Songhees, Esquimalt & WSÁNEĆ territory; Retired MRU Librarian, retired Project Information Literacy researcher, interested in everything.

Avatar ALT TEXT: headshot of a white woman against a background of file boxes of work in progress and abandoned projects

Header ALT TEXT: View across the blue Salish Sea to mountains, some still with a bit of snow at the peaks. The sky is partly cloudy.
